name: Spicy Chocolate Pumpkin Milkshake
description: We like the way the cayenne cuts through the sweetness of this spicy chocolate milkshake, but if you're not a fan of heat, you might want to dial down the cayenne by half.
recipeIngredient: 3 cups chocolate ice cream (about 6 medium scoops)
Garnish: whipped cream and chocolate to grate on top

recipeInstructions.text: Add milk, pumpkin, cayenne, cinnamon, ginger, and cloves to the jar of a blender. Add ice cream and pulse until smooth. Divide between serving glasses and garnish with whipped cream and grated chocolate if desired.
